Yvonne Nduom (amuru 9 Julaị 1953) bu onye oha na eze Ghana mara amara dika nwunye onye ndu otu pati ndi mmadu na-aga n'ihu
ọ bụ onye isi oche ugbu a onye ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ aki oyibo Grove Hotels
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na OLA Catholic Girls School na Elmina na Archbishop Porter Girls Secondary School na Takoradi
Louis Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ nke isii ya
O nwere nzere BA na Bekee na nzere masta na Education Administration and Supervision site na Mahadum Cape Coast na Mahadim Wisconsin.
Ọ natara Life Time Award In Hospitality Investment site na Ghana Tourism Authority na 2012.
Yvonne lụrụ Paa Kwesi Nduom na ụmụ anọ, Nana Kweku Nduom, Edjah Kweku Nduum, Chief Nduom, na Nana Aba Nduom.
